    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L3
    [int]                                   1         4
    [main]                                  5         9
    [(]                                     9         10
    [)]                                     10        11
L4
    [{]                                     1         2
L5
    [std]                                   4         7
    [::]                                    7         9
    [cout]                                  9         13
    [<<]                                    14        16
    ["Hello, "]                             17        26
L6
    ["world!\\n"]                           17        27
    [;]                                     27        28
L7
    [return]                                4         10
    [0]                                     11        12
    [;]                                     12        13
L8
    [}]                                     1         2
EOF
